title: Performance-Centered Education Utilizing Ancient Greek Drama and Expert Mantle Techniques

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Theater Studies and Fundamental Understanding of Ancient Greek Culture
context.additional_context: Creation of a practical learning environment through the use of digital devices and group collaboration.

learning_goals: Analyze the historical and cultural context of ancient Greek drama and reinterpret it from a modern perspective.
Apply the expert mantle technique to perform roles of characters or production teams, demonstrating creative problem-solving skills.
Combine digital tools and offline workshops to collaboratively plan and execute drama performance projects.

resources: Ancient Greek Drama Texts (Sophocles, Euripides, etc.)
Digital Content Creation Tools (Video Editing Software, etc.)
Performance Space and Prop Rental System

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
